Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'The greatest feature of the "Virtual Horizon" command system is its capability to train a commandant\'s adaptability when forming temporary teams.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Which is why you aren't provided with a fixed one. Commandants will have to draft random personnel and form a temporary team to deal with various battle scenarios.", 4: '1'}
{2: "So I don't have to command the fights themselves?", 3: '6'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'This removes the unstable factors of in-battle command, and you can instead focus on team formation for Constructs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "This shouldn't be a problem for you considering that you've been in numerous teams and are familiar with various types of Constructs.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "And one more thing... The original system's Construct database is too old. So I replaced it with the ones in our database.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'However, this system will automatically adjust the basic performance for Constructs, so even the combat performance of support-type frames may take you by surprise.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You hear the unstable electronic voice of the female AI once more.'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'Commandant, now randomly assigning Constructs for the new missionsâ€”'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Well, it's all just data. It doesn't matter as long as you put them to good use.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lotus', 3: 'I hope you find my performance satisfactory.', 4: '2'}
